Help:
[CMD_KEY]optinhere

Optin to BattleBanana on a guild.
Success: You've opted in on this guild!
SuccessExtra:
You've opted in on this guild!
However this is overridden by your global optout.
To optin everywhere to ``[CMD_KEY]optin``
Global:
You've opted out of BattleBanana everywhere!
To use BattleBanana do ``[CMD_KEY]optin``
NotOptOut: You've not opted out on this guild.
